Class Catalyst

  • java.lang.Object
    • Molecule
      • Catalyst
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Immutable, java.io.Serializable

    public class Catalyst
extends Molecule
implements Immutable, java.io.Serializable
    Represents a collection of connected fragments. This class is effectively immutable and serializable.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Catalyst

        protected Catalyst(java.lang.String name,
        java.util.List<Atom> contents,
         connectivity,
        java.util.List<Fragment> fragmentList)
        Private constructor used to create modified copies of the Catalyst. External modification to the Catalyst should be performed using methods such as addLeft() and addRight() only.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the catalyst
        contents - an List of the Atoms
        connectivity - a graph of the bonds
        fragmentList - a List of the Fragments contained

      • Catalyst

        public Catalyst(Fragment fragment)
        Default constructor that initializes the Catalyst with the first fragment
        Parameters:
        fragment - the first fragment

      • getLeftConnect

        public Atom getLeftConnect()
        Returns the left connection point of the linear chain.

      • getRightConnect

        public Atom getRightConnect()

      • getTorsions

        public java.util.List<IndexTorsion> getTorsions()
        Generates a list of IndexTorsions from the rotatable bonds.
        Returns:
        a list of IndexTorsions

      • getLinearTorsions

        public java.util.List<IndexTorsion> getLinearTorsions()
        Gets torsions from a cyclic catalyst. Cuts the connection bond and returns the remaining torsions.

      • cyclize

        public Catalyst cyclize()
        Cyclization method. Returns a cyclized version of this catalyst.

      • addLeft

        public Catalyst addLeft(Fragment fragment)
        Factory method that returns a copy of the Catalyst with fragment appended on left. The catalyst left connection atom is connected to the fragment's right connection point, and angles are crudely adjusted.
        Parameters:
        fragment - the fragment to be added
        Returns:
        elongated Catalyst

      • addRight

        public Catalyst addRight(Fragment fragment)
        Factory method that returns a copy of the Catalyst with fragment appended on right. The catalyst right connection atom is connected to the fragment's left connection point, and angles are crudely adjusted.
        Parameters:
        fragment - the fragment to be added
        Returns:
        elongated Catalyst

      • geometryCorrect

        public Catalyst geometryCorrect(Atom atom1,
                       Atom atom2)
        Corrects the geometry at the given atoms. The geometry correction sets the bond length to a default value.
        Parameters:
        atom1 - the first atom
        atom2 - the second atom

      • moveAtoms

        public Catalyst moveAtoms(java.util.Map<Atom,Atom> atomMap)
        Factory method to create a Catalyst given a map of old atoms to new atoms. Should be used to move atoms.
        Overrides:
        moveAtoms in class Molecule
        Parameters:
        atomMap - a map from old atoms to new atoms (does not have to include all atoms)
        Returns:
        a moved Catalyst

      • transform

        public Catalyst transform(Rotation rot,
                 Vector3D shift)
        Factory method to create a new Catalyst by transforming this one. The rotation is applied before the translation.
        Overrides:
        transform in class Molecule
        Parameters:
        rot - a three-dimensional rotation that we apply to the Atoms in this to get the Atoms in the output
        shift - a vector that we add to the positions of the Atoms in this to get the positions of the Atoms in the output
        Returns:
        this rotated by rot, plus shift

      • shift

        public Catalyst shift(Vector3D shift)
        Factory method to create a new Catalyst by shifting this one. Uses Rotation.IDENTITY as a parameter in the transform method
        Overrides:
        shift in class Molecule
        Parameters:
        shift - a vector that we add to the positions of the Atoms in this to get the positions of the Atoms in the output
        Returns:
        this plus shift

      • setDistance

        public Catalyst setDistance(Atom atom1,
                   Atom atom2,
                   double requestedDistance)
        Moves the group associated with atom2 to the specified distance. Motion occurs along the atom1-atom2 bond vector. Note that this returns a new molecule. No checks are made.
        Overrides:
        setDistance in class Molecule
        Parameters:
        atom1 - this atom will be held fixed
        atom2 - this atom and anything connected to it will be moved
        requestedDistance - the requested distance in Angstroms
        Returns:
        a new Catalyst containing the same connectivity but new positions

      • setDistance

        public Catalyst setDistance(int i,
                   int j,
                   double requestedDistance)
        Alias method. Atom indices are 1, 2, ..., n. No checks.
        Overrides:
        setDistance in class Molecule

      • rotateAngle

        public Catalyst rotateAngle(Atom atom1,
                   Atom atom2,
                   Atom atom3,
                   double theta)
        Rotates the atom1-atom2-atom3 angle, moving only atom3 and anything in its attached subgraph. No checks.
        Overrides:
        rotateAngle in class Molecule
        Parameters:
        atom1 - will not be moved
        atom2 - will not be moved
        atom3 - will be moved
        theta - rotation in degrees
        Returns:
        this rotated

      • setAngle

        public Catalyst setAngle(Atom atom1,
                Atom atom2,
                Atom atom3,
                double theta)
        Set the atom1-atom2-atom3 angle to theta degrees, moving atom3 and its subgraph only. New Catalyst returned. No checks.
        Overrides:
        setAngle in class Molecule
        Parameters:
        atom1 - not moved
        atom2 - not moved
        atom3 - moved
        theta - desired angle in degrees

      • setDihedral

        public Catalyst setDihedral(AtomTorsion atomTorsion,
                   double theta)
        Returns a new Catalyst with a rotated dihedral. Note that the old AtomTorsion will no longer point to the new Molecule.
        Overrides:
        setDihedral in class Molecule
        Parameters:
        theta - the desired dihedral angle in degrees
        Returns:
        the new Catalyst

      • setDihedral

        public Catalyst setDihedral(ProtoTorsion protoTorsion,
                   double theta)
        Description copied from class: Molecule
        Alias method.
        Overrides:
        setDihedral in class Molecule

      • set_sp2

        public Catalyst set_sp2(Atom atom1,
               Atom atom2,
               boolean forceAngle)
        Creates a new Catalyst where atom2 and its subgraph have been moved to make atom1 sp2-hybridized (bond angles set at 120 degrees). Note that the new center will be sp2, but could have distorted torsion angles.
        Overrides:
        set_sp2 in class Molecule
        Parameters:
        atom1 - the atom to be adjusted to sp2
        atom2 - the group to be moved
        forceAngle - true if we want to force the atom1alpha-atom1-atom1beta angle to 120 (safe for non-prolines)
        Returns:
        a new Catalyst with adjusted hybridization

      • set_sp2

        public Catalyst set_sp2(Atom atom1,
               Atom atom2)
        Alias method.
        Overrides:
        set_sp2 in class Molecule

      • set_sp3

        public Catalyst set_sp3(Atom atom1,
               Atom atom2)
        Creates a new Catalyst where atom2 and its subgraph have been moved to make atom1 sp3-hybridized (tetrahedral geometry). Note that the new center will be sp2, but could have distorted torsion angles.
        Overrides:
        set_sp3 in class Molecule
        Parameters:
        atom1 - the atom to be adjusted to sp2
        atom2 - the group to be moved
        Returns:
        a new Catalyst with adjusted hybridization

      • normalize

        public Catalyst normalize()
        Factory method to create a new Catalyst by shifting this one to have its center at the origin.
        Overrides:
        normalize in class Molecule
        Returns:
        this shifted by minus the barycenter of this
